
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/moegarn/p/18813568" title="发布于 2025-04-07 20:43">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Visual Studio C# Winform应用程序图标修改不了 更改图标不生效，发送桌面快捷方式与图标不一致解决办法</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-size: 18px"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1695941/202504/1695941-20250407204155990-817259223.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1695941/202504/1695941-20250407204201219-2072784241.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px">&nbsp;一开始图标为“W”，改成"A"重新编译后，还是“W”</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1695941/202504/1695941-20250407204214797-602715792.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1695941/202504/1695941-20250407204222300-1097891530.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px">方法一</span><br><span style="font-size: 18px">重启电脑</span><br><span style="font-size: 18px">你永远可以相信重启大法，他确实能解决99%的问题，重启完就好了</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px">方法二</span><br><span style="font-size: 18px">修改程序运行目录名或者他的任意父文件夹名</span><br><span style="font-size: 18px">注意：如果在没重启的情况下又把文件夹名改回去了，那图标也回去了</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px">提示</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1695941/202504/1695941-20250407204248053-1936974532.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><br><span style="font-size: 18px">图标最好选择 64×64 以上的，如果设置图标查看方式为大图标那就需要 128×128 以上的</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><br><span style="font-size: 18px">————————————————</span></p>

</div>
